title: Clipboard Inserter
name: clipboard-inserter
description: A simple addon whose purpose is to automatically insert contents of clipboard into the page. Uses icon made by Google from www.flaticon.com licensed by CC 3.0 BY
author: Yoitsumi

preferences.name: container-selector
preferences.title: Containing element selector
preferences.description: css selector of the element which should contain added elements. If you don't know what this means leaving this as 'body' will just append at the end of the document
